name: Big City, Bigger Robot FREE for Google Cardboard
name_original: Big City, Bigger Robot FREE for Google Cardboard
description:
Experience VR for free! Channel godzilla and destroy a miniature city full of robots. Dodge sniper planes while trying to demolish as much of your surroundings before the timer runs down.

HIGHLIGHTS:
- Moving robot NPCs
- Sniper plane enemies
- Timed gameplay
- Teleport-based movement
- Easy-to-learn controls
- Dark color scheme to minimize eye strain
- Detailed tutorial w/ animated illustrations
- Limited advertising
- No registration
- No links to social media
- No push notifications
